column4: I was installing emerald and I ran into some problems, but it left me with no window deocrations and I can't move or close anything. Can someone tell me how to re-enable xfce?
I was installing emerald and I ran into some problems, but it left me with no window deocrations and I can't move or close anything. Can someone tell me how to re-enable xfce?
I have an intel integrated POS running the 945GM chipset
